system.description: The user changes Forme. Passive: The user changes from its Sky Forme to its Land Forme if Thunderstorm, Hailstorm, Umbra, Enshrouded, or Radstorm Weathers (and their Tier 3 variants) are present. The user may freely change Formes as a Downtime Action. Depending on its Forme, it gains two Abilities: Land Forme - Natural Cure, Harvest; Sky Forme - Serene Grace, Wind Rider
